text: Approval for a multifocal design of the bausch & lomb purevision visibility tinted contact lenses and is indicated for daily wear or extended wear from 1 to 30 days between removals, for cleaning and disinfection or disposal of the lens, as recommended by the eye care professional.  The lens is indicated for the correction of refractive ametropia (myopia, hyperopia and astigmatism) and presbyopia in aphakic and/or not-aphakic persons with non-diseased eyes, exhibiting astigmatism of 2.00 diopters or less, that does not interfere with visual acuity.  The lens may be prescribed for frequent/planned replacement wear or disposable wear in spherical powers ranging from +6.00d to -18.00d when prescribed for up to 30 days of extended wear and from +20.00 to -20.00 for daily wear or extended wear up to 7 days with add powers ranging from +0.75 to +5.00d.
